"...<%me>. I've heard that you can see A: "I've also heard that you provided her assistance... I wanted to express my deepest gratitude."
"I am unqualified, so I cannot see her with my own eyes... But I can tell."
"She was saved because of you. Therefore, you have my thanks."
"You were the one who protected her."
"...Haha. Don't turn this into an endless exchange of appreciation."
"...I suppose. I was able to protect her this time."
"Although Alma has passed, her wishes became the foundation for ARKS."
"That is why I must continue to protect it. The place where she, and all of us, belong. Until the day she can rest in peace."
"...Maria and I cannot see her. We cannot hear her words, so we must rely on you."
"...Please, do what you can for her. Lend her your aid, should she ever need it."
